IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PORTLEDGE SCHOOL OFFERS A COMPETITIVE COLLEGE PREPARATORY PROGRAM IN A WARM, INCLUSIVE COMMUNITY. STUDENTS ARE INSPIRED TO REALIZE THEIR INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL BY DEVELOPING THE SKILLS AND COURAGE NECESSARY FOR LIFELONG LEARNING IN AN INCREASINGLY COMPLEX WORLD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PORTLEDGE SCHOOL OFFERS A COMPETITIVE COLLEGE PREPARATORY PROGRAM IN A WARM, INCLUSIVE COMMUNITY. STUDENTS ARE INSPIRED TO REALIZE THEIR INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL BY DEVELOPING THE SKILLS AND COURAGE NECESSARY FOR LIFELONG LEARNING IN AN INCREASINGLY COMPLEX WORLD.
IRS990.Desc: AUXILARY SERVICES - PROVIDES STUDENTS WITH LUNCH, HEALTH AND OTHER PROGRAMS IN CONNECTION WITH INSTRUCTION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: INSTRUCTION PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL SERVICES FOR APPROXIMATELY 530 ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOL CHILDREN

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: BANK-CASH RESTRICTED TO INVESTMENT IN PROPERTY & EQUIPMENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EARNINGS ON ENDOWMENT FUNDS SHALL BE USED TO PROVIDE FOR BUILDINGS AND GROUNDS, FACULTY COMPENSATION AND STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS.
RENTAL EXPENSE NETTED WITH GROSS REVENUE ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 15,000.
SCHOLARSHIPS AND TUITION DISCOUNTS NETTED WITH GROSS TUITION ON FINANCIALS 2,784,328.
RENTAL EXPENSE NETTED WITH GROSS REVENUE ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 15,000.
SCHOLARSHIPS AND TUITION DISCOUNTS NETTED WITH GROSS TUITION ON FINANCIALS 2,784,328.
INFORMATION REGARDING THE RACIALLY, NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS PUBLISHED ANNUALLY IN A LONG ISLAND NEWSPAPER.
THE SCHOOL RECEIVED $216,598 IN ASSISTANCE FROM THE NEW YORK STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT.
ALL FINANCIAL AID AWARDED TO STUDENTS IS IN THE FORM OF REDUCTION OF TUITION, WHICH IS MONITORED BY THE ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT.
THE SCHOOL PROVIDES ON-CAMPUS HOUSING FOR THE HEADMASTER SO THAT HE OR SHE IS AVAILABLE AT ALL TIMES TO MANAGE THE SCHOOL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING TREASURER & ASSISTANT TREASURER REVIEWED THE TAX RETURN PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH THIS POLICY. THE SCHOOL MAINTAINS AND PROVIDES AN ANNUAL HAND BOOK INCLUSIVE OF THIS POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF BOARD, MADE UP OF INDEPENDENT MEMBERS, MEETS ANNUALLY TO MAKE COMPENSATION DECISIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL INFORMATION IS AVALIABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FROM FORM 990 PAGE 12 PART XII LINE 2C:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL HAS A COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILTY FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
